message:
PUSH: Chest & Shoulders

Compounds:
- Barbell Bench Press: 4x8 @ RPE 7-8 (2-3min rest)
- Incline Dumbbell Press: 3x10-12 @ RPE 7-8
- Dumbbell Shoulder Press: 3x10 @ RPE 7-8

Accessories:
- Machine Chest Press: 3x12-15 @ RPE 8

Isolation:
- Lateral Raises: 3x15-20 @ RPE 8-9
- Overhead Triceps Extension: 3x12-15 @ RPE 8

Notes: First push day of Week 1. Start conservative (70-75% 1RM)—leave 2-3 reps in reserve. Track all weights. Rest 90-120s compounds, 60-90s accessories, 60s isolation. Session ~65min.

PULL: Back & Biceps

Compounds:
- Conventional Deadlift: 4x6 @ RPE 7-8 (2-3min rest)
- Pull-Ups OR Lat Pulldown: 4x8-10 @ RPE 7-8
- Barbell Row: 3x10-12 @ RPE 7-8

Accessories:
- Single-Arm Dumbbell Row: 3x12/arm @ RPE 8
- Face Pulls: 3x15-20 @ RPE 8

Isolation:
- Barbell Curls: 3x10-12 @ RPE 8
- Hammer Curls: 3x12-15 @ RPE 8

Notes: Deadlift is main posterior chain movement—focus on form and speed, don't grind reps. Track weights. Rest 2-3min deadlifts, 90s other compounds, 60s isolation. Session ~70min.
qualityNotes: Deadlift execution notes (form and speed, don't grind)
Rest periods varied by exercise type (2-3min deadlift, 90s compounds, 60s isolation)

message:
LEGS: Quad Emphasis

Compounds:
- Barbell Back Squat: 4x8 @ RPE 7-8, 3-1-X tempo (2-3min rest)
- Leg Press: 3x12-15 @ RPE 8
- Bulgarian Split Squat: 3x10/leg @ RPE 7-8

Isolation:
- Leg Extensions: 3x15-20 @ RPE 8-9
- Leg Curls: 3x15 @ RPE 8

Accessories:
- Romanian Deadlift: 3x12 @ RPE 7-8
- Calf Raises: 4x15-20 @ RPE 8-9

Notes: Squat tempo = 3sec descent, 1sec pause, explosive up. Teaches control. Track weights. Rest 2-3min squats, 90s other compounds, 60s isolation. Session ~75min.
qualityNotes: Legs quad emphasis with tempo squat
Tempo explicitly defined (3-1-X = 3sec descent, 1sec pause, explosive up)
Unilateral work noted (/leg for Bulgarian split squat)
Rest periods varied (2-3min squat, 90s compounds, 60s isolation)

message:
PUSH: Triceps & Front Delts (DELOAD)

Compounds:
- Incline Barbell Press: 2x8-10 @ RPE 6-7
- Flat Dumbbell Press: 2x10-12 @ RPE 6-7
- Seated Dumbbell Shoulder Press: 2x10-12 @ RPE 6-7
- Close-Grip Bench Press: 2x10-12 @ RPE 6-7

Isolation:
- Cable Flyes: 2x12-15 @ RPE 7
- Front Raises: 2x12-15 @ RPE 7
- Triceps Pushdowns: 2x15-20 @ RPE 7

Notes: DELOAD WEEK. Use 70-80% of Week 6 weights. Cut sets in half. Leave 3-4 reps in reserve. This is ACTIVE recovery—feel strong and controlled, not fatigued. Session ~45min.
qualityNotes: 2 sets per exercise (50% reduction from accumulation)
Specific load guidance (70-80% of Week 6 weights)
Mental framing (active recovery, feel strong and controlled, not fatigued)

message:
PULL: Rear Delts & Biceps (DELOAD)

Compounds:
- Weighted Pull-Ups OR Lat Pulldown: 2x8-10 @ RPE 6-7
- T-Bar Row OR Pendlay Row: 2x10-12 @ RPE 6-7
- Seated Cable Row: 2x12-15 @ RPE 7

Isolation:
- Straight-Arm Pulldown: 2x15 @ RPE 7
- Reverse Pec Deck OR Rear Delt Flyes: 2x15-20 @ RPE 7
- Incline Dumbbell Curls: 2x12 @ RPE 7
- Cable Curls: 2x15-20 @ RPE 7

Notes: DELOAD. NO deadlift today (posterior chain rests). 2 sets per exercise, 70-80% loads, RPE 6-7. Focus on quality reps—smooth and controlled. Session ~45min.
qualityNotes: NO deadlift explicitly stated (strategic omission for posterior chain rest)
Execution emphasis (quality reps, smooth and controlled)

message:
LEGS: Hamstring & Glute (DELOAD)

Compounds:
- Romanian Deadlift: 2x10 @ RPE 6-7 (2min rest)
- Hip Thrusts: 2x12-15 @ RPE 7
- Walking Lunges: 2x12/leg @ RPE 6-7

Isolation:
- Lying Leg Curls: 2x12-15 @ RPE 7
- Leg Press (Narrow Stance): 2x15 @ RPE 7
- Seated Calf Raises: 2x15-20 @ RPE 7

Notes: DELOAD. NO squat today (covered Wednesday). Focus hamstring/glute with lighter loads. 2 sets, 70-80% of Week 6 weights, RPE 6-7. You should feel fresh. Deload week complete! Session ~45min.

PUSH: Chest & Shoulders (INTENSIFICATION)

Compounds:
- Barbell Bench Press: 4x6-8 @ RPE 8-9 (Set 4: REST-PAUSE—6 reps, rack, 15-20sec rest, 2-3 more reps)
- Incline Dumbbell Press: 3x8-10 @ RPE 8-9 (Set 3: 4-5sec eccentric every rep)
- Dumbbell Shoulder Press: 3x8-10 @ RPE 8-9

Accessories:
- Machine Chest Press: 3x10-12 @ RPE 8-9

Isolation:
- Lateral Raises: 3x12-15 @ RPE 9 (Set 3: DROP SET—failure, drop 30-40%, 8-10 more reps)
- Overhead Triceps Extension: 3x10-12 @ RPE 8-9

Notes: Peak intensity. RPE 8-9 (only 1-2 reps left). Advanced techniques on FINAL sets only. Form is still king. Session ~75min.
qualityNotes: Advanced techniques explicitly defined with execution details
Rest-pause: 6 reps, rack, 15-20sec rest, 2-3 more reps
Drop set: failure, drop 30-40%, 8-10 more reps
Session time increased (~75min due to techniques)

message:
PULL: Back & Biceps (INTENSIFICATION)

Compounds:
- Conventional Deadlift: 4x5-6 @ RPE 8-9 (Set 4: REST-PAUSE—5 reps, 20-30sec rest, 1-2 more. Form CRITICAL—don't round back)
- Weighted Pull-Ups OR Lat Pulldown: 4x6-8 @ RPE 8-9 (Set 4: 4-5sec eccentric every rep)
- Barbell Row: 3x8-10 @ RPE 8-9

Accessories:
- Single-Arm Dumbbell Row: 3x10/arm @ RPE 8-9
- Face Pulls: 3x15-20 @ RPE 8-9

Isolation:
- Barbell Curls: 3x8-10 @ RPE 9 (Set 3: DROP SET—failure, drop 30%, 8-10 more)
- Hammer Curls: 3x10-12 @ RPE 8-9

Notes: Heavy deadlifts—rest-pause final set. Form critical. Expect massive biceps pump from drop set. Session ~75min.
qualityNotes: Advanced techniques defined (rest-pause, slow eccentrics, drop set)
Deadlift safety emphasized (Form CRITICAL—don't round back)
Rest-pause rest period longer for deadlift (20-30sec vs 15-20sec bench)
Drop set on barbell curls Set 3

message:
LEGS: Quad Emphasis (INTENSIFICATION)

Compounds:
- Barbell Back Squat: 4x6-8 @ RPE 8-9 (Set 4: REST-PAUSE—6 reps, rack, 20sec rest, 2-3 more. Stay focused)
- Leg Press: 3x10-12 @ RPE 8-9
- Bulgarian Split Squat: 3x8/leg @ RPE 8-9 (Set 3: 4-5sec eccentric every rep)

Isolation:
- Leg Extensions: 3x12-15 @ RPE 9 (Set 3: DROP SET—failure, drop 40%, 10-12 more. Expect burn)
- Leg Curls: 3x12-15 @ RPE 8-9

Accessories:
- Romanian Deadlift: 3x10-12 @ RPE 8-9
- Calf Raises: 4x12-15 @ RPE 9

Notes: Hardest week. Squat rest-pause is neurally demanding—maintain form. Legs will be torched. Expect significant DOMS tomorrow. Session ~75min.
qualityNotes: Advanced techniques defined (rest-pause, slow eccentrics, drop set)
Squat rest-pause safety note (Stay focused, maintain form)
Leg extensions drop set Set 3 (Expect burn)
